app_description: The BEST painting application. Functional doodle is simple and intuitive allowing you to start drawing immediately after installation. In the toolbar already installed a set of colors for easy access if it will be enough you can always use a palette of colors with flexible settings. Among the functions doodle: change brush size save the pictures in the gallery eraser clean canvas. If you do happen to have little ones this is simply a must. ! Doodle Draw is a drawing game designed specifically for little kids and adults.
